function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate natural ventilation in hospital and built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement natural ventilation systems and airflow design to enhance air circulation and reduce transmission risk","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, air purifiers, airflow design software","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building designers, healthcare facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing measures in building design","Impact":"Higher likelihood of person-to-person transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate sufficient spacing, one-way flow design, and physical barriers to encourage social distancing","Technologies":"Space planning software, queue management systems, physical barriers (e.g., partitions, screens)","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Poor design of corridors and waiting bays in hospitals","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact transmission and congestion leading to disease spread","Mitigation":"Design corridors to discourage unofficial conversations, ensure sufficient spacing, and create airflow to minimize contact transmission","Technologies":"Space planning software, airflow design software, queue management systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, healthcare facility managers"}]}
